pages.title: Kamen Rider Amazon Alpha
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Amazons Season 1 (2016, web series)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:amazons/devices/amazons_driver#amazons_driver_alpha)Amazons Driver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Punch V$(li)Speed II$(li)Resistance II$(li)Jump Boost II$(li)Strength VIII (with empty hand)
